name: YourKACS
0:
”Alexa, play your k. a. c. s.”
”Alexa, start your k. a. c. s.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: your k. a. c. s.
des: Looking for the top-charting artists and songs from praise & worship, inspirational and adult contemporary Christian genres mixed with the classic Christian hits from the last three decades? Want something more than just great tunes on your digital device? More than music, Your KACS offers the listener's prayer-line 24/7/365 and a broadcast prayer circle three times each day. Ministry moments, practical information and inspiring commentary blend with your favorite artists and music providing fresh variety in every hour. We fill your day with music, teaching, information, story, and prayer. A not-for-profit non-commercial ministry broadcast helping to build a positive environment round the clock. Take Your KACS with you on your digital device, and your music and interactive ministry are always at your fingertips.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
